mapper.insert:
SELECT LPAD(CAST(NEXTVAL('st_inf_log_sq01') AS TEXT),15,'0') AS inf_log_seq
/* StInfLogTrxMapper.insertStInfLog */ insert into st_inf_log( inf_log_seq, inf_typ_cd, req_rply_gb_cd, inf_id, req_url, req_method, req_her_val, qry_str_prmt, req_prmt_obj, upr_inf_log_seq, rply_stat_cd, rply_her_val, rply_cont, sys_reg_id, sys_reg_dtm, sys_mod_id, sys_mod_dtm, sys_reg_menu_id, sys_reg_ip_addr, sys_mod_menu_id, sys_mod_ip_addr ) values( #{infLogSeq}, #{infTypCd}, #{reqRplyGbCd}, #{infId}, #{reqUrl}, #{reqMethod}, #{reqHerVal}, #{qryStrPrmt}, #{reqPrmtObj}, #{uprInfLogSeq}, #{rplyStatCd}, #{rplyHerVal}, #{rplyCont}, #{sysRegId}, now(), #{sysRegId}, now(), #{sysRegMenuId}, #{sysRegIpAddr}, #{sysRegMenuId}, #{sysRegIpAddr} );
